    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:49.000

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:56.000

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.000
    | text      = So it's a catch.
}}

    | timestamp = 00:11:01.000

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:02.000
    | text      = He lived three more years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.000
    | text      = And I worked for a large animal vet, Sonny, all about Depo Medrol and stuff that some
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.000
    | text      = of these vets would go, well, we're going to give you this little bottle, but, you know,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:13.000
    | text      = don't give more than that because it could hurt them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.000
    | text      = Well, when the regular dose would work, I'd give him more because I would call back and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:20.000
    | text      = talk to the vet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.000
    | text      = I know in East Texas and he said it was occasionally to just give more.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.000
    | text      = But I'd have to go to maybe two vets to get enough of it because that's wouldn't give
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.440
    | text      = me enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.440
    | text      = Well, I made the decision to not put the dog down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:31.799
    | text      = He was happy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.799
    | text      = I'd give him twice what you're supposed to give him, supposedly, and the dog would be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.279
    | text      = up in a day, happy running around.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.120

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = agree, but it's like this country, ladies and gentlemen, is a Labrador with hip dysplasia.
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.519
    | text      = He's trying to build up the military because that's all we've got.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.840
    | text      = So another day in Alex Jones's show and another fucking conversation about a dead dog.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.840
    | text      = That's weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:07.840
    | text      = I'm going to clear right out of the gate, Jordan, in saying that I'm not going to sit
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:10.799
    | text      = here and pretend this is evidence of Alex killing a dog or trying to pretend that I
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.100
    | text      = don't understand the allegory he's attempting to present.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:16.960
    | text      = I'm only taking the time to discuss this clip for two reasons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:20.600
    | text      = The first is pretty obvious, and that is compared to normal people, Alex Jones brings up dead
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.080
    | text      = dogs a whole lot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:26.980
    | text      = He compares almost everything, any situation, to a dead dog.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.519
    | text      = He uses memories of dead dogs as an excuse for emotional outbursts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:34.440
    | text      = He on multiple occasions has compared his enemies to dogs that need to be put down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:38.759
    | text      = I'm not in any position to say with certainty why that's the case, but Alex absolutely has
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.120
    | text      = a preoccupation with the death of dogs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:46.279
    | text      = Based on what I've heard on his show, if he talked like this in therapy, his psychologist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:50.299
    | text      = would be negligent if they didn't ask follow-up questions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:53.240
    | text      = Oh, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.240
    | text      = The second reason I bring this up is that I don't think the allegory he's making leads
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:59.080
    | text      = to the conclusion he wants it to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.480
    | text      = In his story, he had an ailing dog who everybody told him should be put down, but he was stubborn
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:06.100
    | text      = and didn't want to listen to their advice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:08.360
    | text      = He'd worked part-time in a farm setting, so he was sure that he knew better than all the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:11.919
    | text      = doctors and veterinarians.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.779
    | text      = In order to keep his dog alive, he broke the law and scammed medicines from multiple veterinary
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.879
    | text      = clinics to give to the dog, which allowed the dog to survive three more years, at which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:23.080
    | text      = point it still died.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:25.600
    | text      = According to Drugs.com, depomedrol is generally used in dogs to, quote, alleviate pain and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.120
    | text      = lameness associated with acute localized arthritic conditions and generalized arthritic conditions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:36.399
    | text      = When a dog is being given depomedrol, they're generally in a great deal of pain, and that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:41.080
    | text      = pain is relieved by the drugs.
}}
